Kannamunda：One of the seven great lakes of Himavā．（A．iv．101； DA．i．164； J．v．415； AA．ii．759； MA．ii．692，etc．）．Its waters never grew hot （SnA．ii．407）．Once a mango from a tree growing on the banks of this lake came into the possession of King Dadhivāhana，and from its stone grew a tree which bore very sweet fruit （J．ii．104）．
